# F# Tutorials

> Hands-on tutorials for learning F# through practical examples. Topics include creating console apps, working with data, building web services, and using F# with .NET libraries. Tutorials progress from beginner to advanced functional programming concepts.

- [Async and Task Programming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/tutorials/async.md): Learn how F# provides clean support for asynchrony based on a language-level programming model derived from core functional programming concepts.
- [Functional Programming Concepts in F#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/tutorials/functional-programming-concepts.md): Learn the concepts of functional programming in F#.
- [Using functions in F#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/tutorials/using-functions.md): Learn about functions and how they are important for programming in F#.

## Subtopics

- [Type Providers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/tutorials/type-providers/llms.txt): 4 topics; Type Providers documentation and reference.
